events.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) optimization for electric vehicle applications
events.wd_label: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) optimization for electric vehicle applications
events.wd_description: Reducing cobalt content and increasing nickel content in NMC to improve energy density and operating voltage.
events.description: Reducing cobalt content and increasing nickel content in NMC to improve energy density and operating voltage.

events.name: Reducing Cobalt Content
events.wd_description: Due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost, reducing the amount of cobalt in NMC.
events.description: Due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost, reducing the amount of cobalt in NMC.

events.name: Increasing Nickel Content
events.wd_description: Provides more capacity within the stable operation window.
events.description: Provides more capacity within the stable operation window.

events.name: NMC Battery Usage in Electric Vehicles
events.wd_label: NMC Battery Usage in Electric Vehicles
events.wd_description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries, installed in BMW ActiveE and BMW i8.
events.description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries, installed in BMW ActiveE and BMW i8.

events.name: NMC Batteries
events.wd_description: Used as cathode batteries in electric vehicles.
events.description: Used as cathode batteries in electric vehicles.
